data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Bluspring Enterprises Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from June 11 2025 the equity shares of Bluspring Enterprises Ltd (Scrip Code: 544414) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250609-25 dated June 09 2025.
